test.gameEngineTest.player

Class PlayerTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • test.gameEngineTest.player.PlayerTest

  • public class PlayerTest
extends java.lang.Object
    This class tests the Reinforcement, Fortification and attack phases.
    Version:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Shivani, Aravind

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlayerTest() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void attack()
      This function tests the attack method result
      void attackWithOneArmy()
      This function gives the attack result when attacker and defender decides number of dice to throw explicitly
      void decreaseOneArmy()
      This function is to test if decrease army function is reducing number of armies by 1 or not
      void gameWinner()
      This function is used to test if it is providing winner of the game properly or not
      void invalidCardSelection()
      This method checks whether the user has selected correct cards to exchange.
      void maxNoOfDice()
      This function tests maxNoOfDice method which gives maximum number of dice attacker and defender can have
      void negativeFortifyArmies()
      This method is used to test the fortify armies method for a negative result.
      void positiveDifferentCardExchange()
      This method checks if the user can exchange different cards.
      void positiveFirstCardExchange()
      This method checks the number of armies returned to the player after he exchanges the cards.
      void positiveFortifyArmies()
      This method is used to test the fortify armies method for a positive result.
      void positiveGetReinforcementArmies()
      This method is used to check if the getReinforcementArmies method is updating the correct value for the player.
      void positiveReinforceArmies()
      This method is used to check if the reinforceArmies method is updating the countries correctly.
      void set()
      This method sets the value that are to be initialized before running each test case.
